Classes in de.systemagmbh.interfaces.database used by de.systemagmbh.components.server
ISysDBRequester
          This is the base for all database connection classes.
 

Classes in de.systemagmbh.interfaces.database used by de.systemagmbh.interfaces.database
CSysDBRException
          Thrown by methods in the implementation of ISysDBRequester class to indicate errors.
ISysDatabaseManager
           
ISysDBRequester
          This is the base for all database connection classes.
ISysProcedureParameter
          ISysProcedureParameter is the interface to hold all necessary data to execute a stored procedure on a database: Key of SQL statement in map file or statement itself that is calling the stored procedure IN parameter and their values and types OUT parameter and their types IN/OUT combinations OUT parameter values after stored procedure execution After setting the right parameter the ISysProcedureParameter object is passed to stored procedure methods of database classes.
 

Classes in de.systemagmbh.interfaces.database used by de.systemagmbh.interfaces.server
ISysDBRequester
          This is the base for all database connection classes.
 

Classes in de.systemagmbh.interfaces.database used by de.systemagmbh.test.database
CSysDBRException
          Thrown by methods in the implementation of ISysDBRequester class to indicate errors.
ISysDatabaseManager
           
ISysDBRequester
          This is the base for all database connection classes.
ISysDBRProcedureParameter
          ISysDBRProcedureParameter is an extra interface for stored procedure calling classes to set the OUT parameter results after stored procedure execution on database.
ISysProcedureParameter
          ISysProcedureParameter is the interface to hold all necessary data to execute a stored procedure on a database: Key of SQL statement in map file or statement itself that is calling the stored procedure IN parameter and their values and types OUT parameter and their types IN/OUT combinations OUT parameter values after stored procedure execution After setting the right parameter the ISysProcedureParameter object is passed to stored procedure methods of database classes.

ISysDBRequester
          This is the base for all database connection classes.
